example.score_reasons: - GOOD: Provides a compelling history and purpose. - GOOD: Includes different ranks and notable NPCs. - BAD: Lacks potential internal conflicts or rivalries.

faction.name: The Veilborn
faction.motto: “Death is but a whisper in the night.”
faction.origin: The Veilborn were formed after the fall of an ancient empire, recruiting those cast aside by society.
faction.purpose: They exist to shape the world from the shadows, eliminating tyrants and corrupt rulers.

notable_members.member: Shade Mistress Velora - The enigmatic leader, said to be immortal.
Rendall "The Phantom" - A rogue assassin who questions the guild’s methods.

faction.rival_factions: The Holy Order of Dawn (Paladins dedicated to eradicating the Veilborn).
